title: When is Tom Hardy on CBeebies Bedtime Stories? The Taboo actor and his dog are reading out The Cloudspotter for Valentines day
text:
Never mind the Valentines, Tom Hardy is reading the CBeebies bedtime story tonight His dog's back too! 
By Radio Times Staff Tuesday 14 February 2017 at 9:52AM 
We’re so familiar gawping at Tom Hardy slashing his way through the cast of Taboo that his message “get yourself tucked up and I’ll see you very soon” sounds a tad threatening. But fortunately it’s all part of a sneak peek at tonight’s CBeebies Bedtime Story. 
Yes, if you’ve not got yourself a date for this evening then you can spend the night with Hardy, Woody the dog and The Cloudspotter by Tom McLaughlin. The Peaky Blinders actor will be reading out the story all about Franklin, a little boy who spends his time alone spotting clouds – only to be soon joined by Scruffy Dog who might ruin the fun. 
But, as Hardy says, you’ll only hear the full story when you’re tucked up tonight. Happy Valentines! CBeebies Bedtime Stories is on 6.50pm tonight, CBeebies
